Package fillrbust

Class Dice

  • java.lang.Object
    • fillrbust.Dice
  • class Dice
extends java.lang.Object
    Set of six standard cubic dice with a number on each side.
    The class maintains a record of which dice are selected,
    the score of the selected dice,
    and which dice are reserved from subsequent rolls.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) static class  Dice.Scoreable
      The set of scoreable dice combinations and their values
